name: Snake (itch) (BarricaGames)
description:
Snake About this game

This is a classic snake game in a pixel art style

This game was made to teach basic concepts of Phaser 3, you can check the repository in Github

Controls

Move the snake with your arrows or if you have a touchscreen device move it with your finger

Options Hit Walls:

If this is active you cannot pass the size of the screen or you will lose

Add Rocks:

If the option is enabled little rocks will be spawning in the screen you have to avoid it or you will lose

Barrica Games 2020
